channel.title: How to make a rsps sever
channel.description:
ok here's the link to the guide: how to make How to make your own RSPS Your Ad Here Ok guys, Here is the moment you all been waiting for. Lets get started on the Tut on how to make ur own runescape server.
STEP ONE- First you will need the highest updates on java ill give u downloading links.
JDK 6 Update 11 with NetBeans 6.5 http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/netbeans.html
JDK 6 Update 10 with Java EE https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP...-CDS_Developer
STEP TWO- Now time to download a source for your server.
TestScape - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VC3TV8XY CheezScape 80 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8MF4EQBL Project 16 Version 6 Edit 7 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=7DO6EFY7 There are also lots more but these are my best recommended ones.
STEP THREE- Get a winzip extracter for source if u don't have one you cna get one here.
WinRAR archiver - http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar361.exe
STEP FOUR- Now that you got winzip downloaded extract the source and open it up. Right click the Compiler and click on edit. Erase everything inside of it and put this in it.
@echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause
Now do the same thing to the Run.java and erase it all and put
@echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
STEP FIVE- Time to set up No-Ip. Go to www.no-ip.com and register. Once you have activated your account download the no-ip and on the site look for where it says host/redirects and create it like servernamehere.no-ip.whateveryouwant. After you are done open the no-ip thing that you downloaded and refresh it. Then your servername should pop up. Click the check box and exit out of it.
STEP SIX- Now it is time to redirect your router to do this is hard to explain so go to this recommended site
192.168.1.1
FINAL STEP- Now you are done! So you can go to silab which link is http://client.silabsoft.org/client.php type in your new servers ip wich would be with the no-ip and then your in! replay with good stuff not mean stuff no flaming plz

item.dc:creator: @everglow20 everglow20
item.description:
@everglow20 wrote:

ok here’s the link to the guide: how to make How to make your own RSPS
Your Ad Here
Ok guys, Here is the moment you all been waiting for. Lets get started on the Tut on how to make ur own runescape server.

STEP ONE-
First you will need the highest updates on java ill give u downloading links.

JDK 6 Update 11 with NetBeans 6.5
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/netbeans.html

JDK 6 Update 10 with Java EE
https://cds.sun.com/is-bin/INTERSHOP…-CDS_Developer

STEP TWO-
Now time to download a source for your server.

TestScape - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=VC3TV8XY
CheezScape 80 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=8MF4EQBL
Project 16 Version 6 Edit 7 - http://www.megaupload.com/?d=7DO6EFY7
There are also lots more but these are my best recommended ones.

STEP THREE-
Get a winzip extracter for source if u don’t have one you cna get one here.

WinRAR archiver - http://www.rarlab.com/rar/wrar361.exe

STEP FOUR-
Now that you got winzip downloaded extract the source and open it up. Right click the Compiler and click on edit. Erase everything inside of it
and put this in it.

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

Now do the same thing to the Run.java and erase it all and put

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

STEP FIVE-
Time to set up No-Ip. Go to www.no-ip.com and register. Once you have activated your account download the no-ip and on the site look for where it says host/redirects and create it like servernamehere.no-ip.whateveryouwant. After you are done open the no-ip thing that you downloaded and refresh it. Then your servername should pop up. Click the check box and exit out of it.

STEP SIX-
Now it is time to redirect your router to do this is hard to explain so go to this recommended site

192.168.1.1

FINAL STEP-
Now you are done! So you can go to silab which link is http://client.silabsoft.org/client.php type in your new servers ip wich would be with the no-ip and then your in!
replay with good stuff not mean stuff no flaming plz
